mapper.select: SELECT e.backgroundColor ,e_t.text title_text,e_t.subtext title_subtext,e_t.left title_left,e_t.top title_top,e_t.right title_right,e_t.bottom title_bottom ,e_l.type legend_type,e_l.left legend_left,e_l.top legend_top,e_l.right legend_right,e_l.bottom legend_bottom,e_l.width legend_width,e_l.height legend_height,e_l.formatter legend_formatter ,e_g.left grid_left,e_g.top grid_top, e_g.right grid_right, e_g.bottom grid_bottom, e_g.width grid_width,e_g.height grid_height,e_g.containLabel grid_containLabel ,e_x.type xAxis_type,e_x.boundaryGap xAxis_boundaryGap ,e_y.type yAxis_type FROM echarts e LEFT JOIN e_title e_t ON e.title_id = e_t.id AND e_t.show = 1 LEFT JOIN e_legend e_l ON e.legend_id = e_l.id LEFT JOIN e_grid e_g ON e.grid_id = e_g.id LEFT JOIN e_xaxis e_x ON e.xAxis_id = e_x.id LEFT JOIN e_yaxis e_y ON e.yAxis_id = e_y.id

SELECT e.type e_type ,e_t.text title_text,e_t.link title_link,e_t.target title_target, e_t.subtext title_subtext,e_t.sublink title_sublink,e_t.subtarget title_subtarget ,e_t.padding title_padding,e_t.itemgap title_itemgap,e_t.left title_left,e_t.top title_top,e_t.right title_right,e_t.bottom title_bottom,e_t.backgroundcolor title_bgColor ,e_l.data legend_data ,e_tt.trigger tooltip_trigger ,e_x.type x_type,e_x.data x_data ,e_y.type y_type ,e_s.smooth series_smooth ,e_s_d.name series_data_mame,e_s_d.value series_data_value ,e_s_a.color areaStyle_color FROM echarts e LEFT JOIN E_title e_t ON e.t_id = e_t.id LEFT JOIN e_legend e_l ON e.l_id = e_l.id LEFT JOIN e_tooltip e_tt ON e.tt_id = e_tt.id LEFT JOIN e_xAxis e_x ON e.x_id = e_x.id LEFT JOIN E_yAxis e_y ON e.y_id = e_y.id LEFT JOIN e_series e_s ON e.s_id = e_s.id LEFT JOIN e_series_data e_s_d ON e_s.data_id = e_s_d.id LEFT JOIN e_series_areaStyle e_s_a ON e_s.areaStyle_id = e_s_a.id AND e_s_d.data_id = e_s_a.data_id AND e_s_a.show = 1 WHERE e.corp_id = #{corp_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND e.type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND e_t.show = 1
